name: Mat Duck
text: The sub from Hungry Howie's Pizza; in Metamora, MI., was as expected: delicious to the last morsel. I'll give it a 10 out of 10; for freshness & flavor.

name: Emily Ulbrik
text: It took forever to get my food even though I was a walk in order and I asked for the $20.99 deal and I got two $10.99 deals which made me pay more than I should have. Definitely going to lapeer next time. Never again from Metamora

name: Philip Kerns
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for reasonable prices. Consistently well kept and with excellent mood. Will visit here again.

name: Amanda Heath
text: Their sauce was sour and I felt sick for a day after eating it. Very mediocre food.

name: Sutton Bates
text: This restaurant is definitely one of the tastiest restaurants in the area. Anytime I go there I am greatly pleased. They keep their high  level service and the highest level of dishes  they serve. You no doubt will love this restaurant. Warmly  recommended.

name: Jamie Pfeiffer
text: We order here often and the past several times we've gotten pizza it is much lower quality than it used to be. We just picked up three pizzas and an order of bread, two of the three pizzas were not cut and two of the three pizzas were under ‚Ä¶More

name: Charles Major
text: The beef and sausage are the same thing, nothing is right when you order and apparently wings don't come with a dipping sauce.

name: Big Al Me
text: Wonderful people and bushes Pizza great

name: Larry Radatz
text: I have made so many orders here I'm afraid to think how much money I have spent here over the years.  Pizza is almost always great.  Had an issue with a double charge a while back.  Manager asked for address because they wanted to make it ‚Ä¶More

name: Humble as_I_ Stumble
text: The Best location to date. These workers get it when it comes to quality made pizza. Everybody is on their job. Always right, Always fresh n Yum.

name: Phillip Patterson
text: The ownership will price this place out of business. I won‚Äôt pay almost double the price for pizza here

name: V Money
text: Something Is going on here the quality of pizza has not been the same.

name: Willis Burnette
text: They use to deliver to my home all the time, now I was told they have a new owner and 6 miles was out of their delivery range. Will never order from them again, it's a shame, no issue with the pizza or crew itself.

name: Samantha P
text: Problems every time I order from this place....either they don‚Äôt bring something that I order or they blame it that someone didn‚Äôt fill the delivery order properly. This time I go to pick up my pizza and one side has NO CHEESE!!!  Delivery ‚Ä¶More

name: Pam Pugliese
text: It is always good they always have good deals and they're fast and very sweet no matter if you pick it up or have it delivered

name: joe gibbons
text:
Great Monday Tuesday deal going on lately
2 med 1 topping pizzas for $7.99 you need to coupon code for it.

name: Teresa Edwards
text: Always  has good food.

name: The armory
text: Always hot and to order. Friendly workers and delivery people.

name: Tammie Ott
text: Second time ordering subs from this store. First time everything was great, subs were loaded with meat. This time however the steak sub had hardly any meat and large hunks of what appeared to be the heart of the lettuce. Very disappointing so make sure you check for meat before driving away.

name: millie jones
text: Had Greek salad only   Was a pickup order only.

name: Mike Edwards
text: Quick and easy. Nice big salad. Pizza was good.

name: Andrea Cicero
text: Tired the subs today. YUM!

name: Helen Calvin
text: 1st time ordering on line did not put mush or bacon way to much sauce thrown on it done with Hungry Howie awful

name: JoAnne Keils
text: Delicious sandwich!

name: Mickee Mickee
text: Advertisements everywhere throughout  different cities for 3 topping large pizza for $7.99 if ordered online.  Of course, the local stores know nothing about it when I called.  When I try to order online using the code, it says no code ‚Ä¶More

name: The Video Guy
text: Great place. Great service. Great food. Bring the whole family they will absolutely adore the greasey, overpriced, terrible tasting, cardboard-esque flavored crust. You might die if you come here but at least it's cheap, right? Oh wait, it's not. This place will give you stage four cancer. You won't regret coming here!ü§©üòçüòöüòé

name: Todd Oliver
text: Loved their gluten free pizza... Veggie plus pepperoni, my favourite :)

name: Ron Brink
text: Good and friendly, typical hungry howie's

name: Bonnie Bruton
text: There was a glitch with online ordering, but the Manager stepped up to get my order finished in record time. This store has great food and excellent customer service.

name: Austin gracey
text: The food is amazing and and the customer service is excellent highly recommend the ham and cheese sandwich, pizza and new cookie they have top quality

name: B P
text: Made a really good pizza and brought it out to the car for me!

name: AndrewTVGaming Vlogs CoolGuy
text: I absolutely love their Pizza!! I am always buying pizza in there and yesterday I placed a big order for a birthday party and all the pizzas were absolutely delicious!! Ask to talk to Amy and she will take a really good care of you!! LOVE Hungry Howie's Metamora!!! :-)

name: Maya Lynn
text: They were very slow and let my Pizza sit in the warmer for 20 minutes while ignoring that I was there

name: bill c
text: Got a all meat pizza and didn't see the meat. Some ham slices into thin strips , some sausage and pepperoni.  No bacon or anything else.  Threw the rest away. Stay away.

name: R & D Channel
text: Ordered delivery, hung up and got in the shower only to get out and find a missed call... apparently I was 8tenths of a mile outside their delivery radius so they canceled my order! I said deliver it to the corner I‚Äôll meet you they said ok ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Wright
text: They are awesome, we had a mix up and they took care of it right then

name: Bobbie Helton
text: Love that they have gluten free crust.

name: ed noble
text: We think it's the best pizza anyplace!

name: Dustin dalessandro
text: It took to long to make it took more than 20 minutes internet order says already done and no pizza yet  GET MORE WORKERS

name: Diana Fackler
text: Better then that hot and ready place

name: Angie Edwards
text: They cook pizzas great and pack the salads full of stuff.

name: Robert Lambert
text: I was greater with a nasty Attitude

name: Jacob Markell
text: Have to listen to an add selling crazy bread for 2min b4 they even pick up the phone!!! Nope
